inclusion.criterion: AS with mean transmitral gradient > 10 mm Hg and aortic valve area < 2 cm2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Indication for surgery (severe AS (aortic valve area < 1 cm2 or < 0.6 cm2/m2 of body surface area and symptoms or congestive heart failure or left ventricular ejection fraction < 50%)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate pulm art pressures, showing no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
